mapper.select: select rownum no, c.* from(select * from board1 where code = 2 order by id)c order by no desc
select rownum no, c.* from(select * from board1 where code = 1 order by id)c order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board1 (code, writer, title, content, filename, filepath) values(#{code}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content} , #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, filename=#{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath=#{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
